hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Liquidity Recovery Hierarchy in Early Bull
hypothesis_content.statement: During early BULL regime transitions (first 7 days), altcoins that recover liquidity metrics (bid-ask spread, book depth) to pre-NEUTRAL levels fastest will outperform slower-recovery peers by >15% over following 10 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Early liquidity recovery signals stronger market maker support and institutional interest, creating positive feedback loops. These coins become liquidity hubs attracting additional capital.
entry_conditions: Regime transition to BULL within past 48 hours
Altcoin's 4-hour average bid-ask spread ≤ pre-NEUTRAL regime average
Order book depth ≥ 90% of pre-NEUTRAL levels
Volume increase > 50% vs NEUTRAL regime average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% price appreciation OR 10 trading days elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Liquidity metrics deteriorate below entry levels

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Fast liquidity recoverers underperform slow recoverers in early bull phases
